welcome_desc: Welcome to the Automated Telegram channel analyzer! Let's set up the app. First, let's set up your language preferences.
desc_desc: This is an automatic Telegram channel crawler that analyzes how channels interact with each other based on reposts. It [soon will build] a visual map of the relationships between channels, showing how they're connected based on reposts.
reason_desc: If you want to get to know your channel in a new way, this will help. You can map your channel and look not at current statistics, but at overall data about your channel and what does it have. Or you can check up on someone else :)
safety_desc: This application doesn't send any of your data anywhere. Your Telegram account is needed for the app to function, but it will NEVER leave your device. This application is open-source, so you can check out the source code or build your own app using it!
crowdsource_desc: You can allow the app to share found connections with the community. It will allow us to make global relations map that will be available to everyone. Should you choose to share, you will not see any ads in the app. It is up to you.
done_desc: You've set your preferences. Enjoy your exploration journey and thanks for trying!
loading_desc: Hold on while we intitialize the Telegram Library. This could take some time, don't worry!
login_desc: Now you have to log in with your Telegram account for app to be able to read Telegram channels. Remember, this will only be used for scanning channels, we won't have access to your messages and your account won't leave this app.
code_desc: Please, enter the code, sent to you by Telegram.
password_desc: Please, enter your password to complete login. Remember, NONE of your data (credentials, messages, etc.) won't leave this device. Your privacy and safety is important for us.
user_loading_desc: Validating your login and starting app engine...
sharing_disabled_desc: Please note that analyzed channel data sharing is disabled. This project depends on data gathered by users, so we'd like to ask you to enable sharing so we can make map of Telegram channels together.
channel_search_desc: Let's index a channel. Firstly, please, enter it's @name or link and tap search button. Next, confirm if the found channel is the correct one and let's get indexing.
channel_not_found_desc: This channel ID doesn't exist, please check or copy anew and try again!
channel_searching_desc: We are searching for this channel, hold on...
clear_index_desc: Start new index for this channel
clear_index_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset indexing results for this channel? It is (PERCENT)% indexed.
no_indexed_desc: You have to add one to begin
no_relations_desc: Continue to index to discover them
restart_tdlib_error_desc: Error while initializing TDLib: took too long
notification_desc: This notification keeps the app alive in background :)
settings_batches_desc:
Request (MESSAGES) messages at once
More = faster, less = smoother
